Package pl

Interface Summary
ConfigLoader Interface for all config loaders for the Persistence Layer.
Configurable  
Transaction  
 

Class Summary
Cursor This class represents result of the RetrieveCriteria's perform method.
PersistenceManager  
PersistenceManagerFactory  
PersistentObject This class encapsulates the behavior needed to make single instances persistent and is the class that business/domain classes inherit from to become persistent.
XMLConfigLoader This class implements ConfigLoader interface and is responsible for loading Persistence Layer configs from XML files.
 

Exception Summary
OptimisticLockException This exception is thrown if optimistic lock is not supported by an object.
PlException Exception class for all errors in the Persistence Layer.
